creator: Bot-Publishing Inc.
descriptionHtml:
If you're a dedicated English "reader and learner", you're absolutely in the right place to dramatically improve and speak English! This is the "Next Chapter" in your English learning. Welcome to LillyPad, the Learn English app!

Did you know that "Reading" for a language learner is the best way to improve the language you love! Reading is the most academically studied and recommended path to achieving English fluency and proficiency!

Learn English Listening and Speaking

Our English learning app offers English for beginners, English for intermediate, and you can even improve your advanced English! Try LillyPad for 14-days for free! If you're serious and want to speak English, then you must practice speaking English every day! You will learn English speaking by having an English conversation with Lilly!

Once you sign in, we encourage you to make an in-app success plan and read English with Lilly every day for just 15 minutes!

After 14 days, you will have improved your English reading, enhanced your English listening, and spoken thousands of English words! English listening and speaking English aloud are essential for your success. You will also have practiced your English pronunciation, spelling, and will expand vocabulary. You will also have started down the road to learning hundreds of new English phrases!

4 Ways to Read English with Lilly!

Read to Lilly – Now you're speaking English!
Listen to Lilly - Turn anything into an Audiobook and learn English listening and speaking!
Repeat Read after Lilly – Awesome for English Beginners!
Read with Lilly - Collaborate with Lilly to help you speak English fluently!

What can I read in Lilly's Library?

There are thousands of Free English Reading Books! Or buy books of interest!
You can make a Blog Library: Read all your favorite English blogs with Lilly!
Import and learn English reading books, articles, Docs, and PDFs from your computer!
Read thousands of Ted Talks, Friends episodes, and Famous Speeches for free!

Save time – Stay Organized – Learn English Faster!
When reading in any mode, you can "listen" to any word, look up the "meaning" in Lilly's English dictionary, or "translate" it into your native language. All these words/activities, including the words you mispronounce are collected, tracked, and delivered for your personalized practice across all the Learning Pads via our spaced repetition algorithm.

Learn English Essentials with Lilly!

English Spelling app feature: practice spelling your personal words with Lilly while improving your English reading, writing and pronunciation.
Pronunciation app feature: Our pronounce words app feature with Lilly will improve your English pronunciation and your confidence.
Vocabulary Builder app feature: This is how to improve vocabulary! Dramatically expand vocabulary of thousands of new English words through English communication with Lilly!
Play Awesome English Word Games with Lilly!
Lilly's Gold: Learn thousands of English Phrases with Lilly! Speak practice your English!

Lilly's Gold improves English writing, English spelling, English pronunciation, English reading, English listening, bi-directional language training, deliberate and spaced repetition practice!

Reading with Lilly for only 15-minutes a day will help you developing one of life's powerful habits that can change your life forever!

LillyPad isn't just the next chapter in English learning...it's a life changing story!

PLEASE NOTE:
There is a 14-day free trial period.
After your free trial LillyPad is then offered on a subscription basis.
Premium Plan: includes all functionality and is offered Monthly, Quarterly, Semi-annually.
Basic Plan: includes limited functionality and is offered Monthly.
descriptionShort: Learn English by Reading, Speaking & Listening

creator: Bot-Publishing Inc.
descriptionHtml:
If you're a dedicated English reader and learner, you're absolutely in the right place to dramatically improve your English knowledge - grammar, spelling, pronunciation, and vocabulary. Start your English learning story! This is the "Next Chapter" in your English learning. Welcome to LillyPad, the Learn English app!

Did you know that reading a story for a language learner is the best way to see visible improvement in language skills, expand vocabulary and start to speak English fluently? Reading is the most academically studied and recommended path to achieving visible results - English fluency and proficiency!

Learn English Listening and Speaking

Our English learning app offers English for beginners, English for intermediate, and you can even see visible improvement in your advanced English! Try LillyPad for 14 days for free! If you're serious and want to speak English, then you must practice speaking English every day! You will learn English speaking by having a conversation in English with Lilly!

Once you sign in, we encourage you to make an in-app success plan and read English with Lilly every day for just 15 minutes!

After 14 days, you will have visible improvement in your English reading, enhanced your English listening, and expanded your English vocabulary! English listening and speaking English aloud are essential for your success. You will also have practiced your English pronunciation, and spelling, and will have visible grammar knowledge.

4 Ways to Read English with Lilly!

Read to Lilly – Now you're speaking English!
Listen to Lilly - Turn anything into an Audiobook and learn English listening and speaking!
Repeat Read after Lilly – Awesome for English Beginners to get visible improvement in grammar, spelling, and vocabulary and start to speak English!
Read with Lilly - Collaborate with Lilly to help you speak English fluently!

What can I read in Lilly's Library?

There are thousands of Free Books available to improve your language skills through a story! Also, you can buy books or a story of interest!

Save time – Stay Organised – Learn English Faster!

When reading in any mode, you can "listen" to any word, look up the "meaning" in Lilly's English dictionary, or "translate" it into your native language to learn English grammar faster. A natural approach to learning English with our English learning app!

Learn English Essentials with Lilly!

English Spelling app feature: practice spelling your personal words with Lilly while improving your English reading, writing, vocabulary, and pronunciation.
Pronunciation app feature: Our pronounce words app feature with Lilly will bring visible improvement to your English pronunciation and your confidence, helping you learn English and improve quickly.
Vocabulary Builder app feature: This is how to improve vocabulary! Dramatically expand the vocabulary of thousands of new English words through English communication with Lilly!
Play Awesome English-learning Word Games with Lilly!
Lilly's Gold: Learn thousands of English Phrases and improve grammar with Lilly! Speak and practice your English learning app!

Lilly's Gold improves English writing, spelling, pronunciation, reading, listening, bi-directional language training, vocabulary, deliberate and spaced repetition practice!

Reading to Lilly helps expand vocabulary, learn English, improve grammar knowledge and see a visible change in your life forever with LillyPad - English learning app!

LillyPad isn't just the next chapter in English learning - it's a life-changing story!

PLEASE NOTE:
There is a 14-day free trial period.
After your free trial, LillyPad is then offered on a subscription basis.

creator: Bot-Publishing Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to LillyPad, the #1 AI English learning application for intermediate and advanced learners.

LillyPad is an innovative English learning platform for ESL (English as a Second Language) and EFL (English as a Foreign Language) learners, or native English learners.

LillyPad was designed to dramatically improve your English language skills for your career, grades, or brains! Gain the necessary English language skills for success in your career, or studying abroad. Get ready for English Test Prep and demonstrate your proficiency with the guidance of our AI English Tutor – Lilly!

Whether you're interested in improving your English, want to learn Business English, or academic English, or are preparing for exams like IELTS and TOEFL we've got you covered. Enhance your English reading, listening, speaking, writing, vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation, and spelling skills with our comprehensive resources and cutting-edge technology.

Experience interactive English learning that keeps you engaged. Sharpen your speaking and listening skills with targeted personalized practice. Enhance your English comprehension through interactive reading, learning, and testing with any content.

Reading is known as the most effective way to improve any language you want to dramatically improve, and LillyPad is here to support your learning journey.

Experience remarkable progress in grammar, spelling, pronunciation, vocabulary, comprehension, and overall English knowledge as you delve into the captivating stories, articles, and books within our extensive library, or import your own English content to practice.

Easily find resources to learn about your career, studying Abroad, English for Job Interviews, and English for Professionals, equipping you with the necessary skills to succeed.

Introducing “OpenBook” functionality! Intermediate and Advanced English now have the freedom to read just about anything they love in 4 interactive ways, while combining the awesome ability to “openly” ask Lilly ( our AI Tutor) questions, discuss specific pages or chapters, and receive personalized explanations to deepen their understanding of any topic.

With “OpenBook”, you not only enhance your English language skills but you have the opportunity to gain valuable insights into different topics, cultures, ideas, and perspectives.

LillyPad also maximizes your progress by incorporating a wide array of innovative English learning modules, providing learners with immense value. Expand your word knowledge and acquire new English expressions through our interactive vocabulary builder or Lilly’s Gold phrases where you can learn hundreds of new English phrases or write your own!

Receive real-time feedback to improve your English pronunciation or spelling. Strengthen your English grammar skills through interactive quizzes, real-time comprehension, and parts of speech testing.

And introducing our newest learning module “OpenChat” with Lilly, our AI-driven “OpenChat” learning module is designed to elevate your English skills while exploring any subject that captivates your interest. Through interactive and immersive discussions, “OpenChat” with Lilly empowers you to express yourself confidently, grow your knowledge, and strengthen your English fluency in an enjoyable and personalized manner.

Enhance your English knowledge and fluency with our immersive learning approach. Benefit from our Artificial Intelligent English Tutor and join our worldwide community of upwardly mobile career-orientated and International Students dramatically improving their English.

Please note: LillyPad is offered on a subscription-based model after the trial period.

For English Teachers & Tutors: The ultimate AI-powered English Assistant. Discover our comprehensive backend for English teachers & Tutors! Assign your reading materials, learning modules, and effortlessly track individual or group progress. Sign up for free – Your Students receive a discounted rate!
